Age: Role: Feature, Description: Age of the player.
Gender: Role: Feature, Description: Gender of the player.
Location: Role: Feature, Description: Geographic location of the player.
GameGenre: Role: Feature, Description: Genre of the game the player is engaged in.
PlayTimeHours: Role: Feature, Description: Average hours spent playing per session.
InGamePurchases: Role: Feature, Description: Indicates whether the player makes in-game purchases (0 = No, 1 = Yes).
GameDifficulty: Role: Feature, Description: Difficulty level of the game.
SessionsPerWeek: Role: Feature, Description: Number of gaming sessions per week.
AvgSessionDurationMinutes: Role: Feature, Description: Average duration of each gaming session in minutes.
PlayerLevel: Role: Feature, Description: Current level of the player in the game.
AchievementsUnlocked: Role: Feature, Description: Number of achievements unlocked by the player.
EngagementLevel: Role: Target, Description: Categorized engagement level reflecting player retention ('High', 'Medium', 'Low').
